description: Hoard.fyi, Screen Size Map, Mirage JS, Stock Resources, Vuer, React Libraries and more...

items.title: Hoard.fyi
items.description: A large list of tools and resources for web developers and designers.

items.title: Screen Size Map
items.description: An interactive map of the most popular screen sizes.

items.title: Mirage JS
items.description: An API mocking library to help you build your frontend without having the backend.

items.title: Awesome Stock Resources
items.description: A huge list of stock resources, including photography, videos, fonts icons and more.

items.title: Vuer
items.description: A simple GitHub profile viewing tool, made by Cade Kyanston with Vue, Chart.js and Bulma.

items.title: React Libraries
items.description: A curated database of popular React libraries.

items.title: Rough.js
items.description: A small graphics library for drawing sketchy images with canvas or svg.

items.title: IsometricSass
items.description: A sass library for isometric animations.

items.title: The Complete Freelance Web Developer Guide
items.description: A detailed article by Luke Ciciliano how to make money through freelancing.

items.title: Dark Reader
items.description: A chorme and firefox extension to add a dark mode to any website.

items.title: Introducing Yarn 2
items.description: An article by MaÃ«l Nison about the release of the new yarn version.
